title: Can anyone identify this serif font
author: therod

comments.content:
Not finding a spot-on match.

Add a stroke to Californian Black and compress it vertically, and it comes close:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-californian/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150115134258/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-californian/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-californian/")
Thanks kthomps5. I'll give that a shot.
